Servers.genRep

Interface IGenRep

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IArrivalTerminalExitGenRep, IBusGenRep, IDriverGenRep, IPassengerGenRep, IPorterGenRep, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MGeneralRepository

    public interface IGenRep
extends IPassengerGenRep, IDriverGenRep, IPorterGenRep, IBusGenRep, IArrivalTerminalExitGenRep, java.rmi.Remote
    This interface contains all the methods that MGenRep must implement.
    Author:
    Filipe Teixeira , Miguel Azevedo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endSimulation()
      Used to indicate that everything is done and the GenRep may close the log.
      int getBusWaitTime()
      Returns the time, in mili-seconds, that the bus waits for more passengers.
      int getMaxBags()
      Returns the maximum number of bags each passengers can have
      int getNumBusSeats()
      Returns the number of seats on the bus
      int getNumFlights()
      Returns the number of flights of the simulation
      int getNumPassengers()
      Returns the number of passengers in each flight
      java.lang.String getServiceLocation(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Returns the location of the requested service
      void planeFinished()
      Blocks the caller until the driver and porter are done with the current flight
      void registerService(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String hostname)
      Registers the new service's location on the General Repository.
      void waitForDriverToDie()
      Bloks the caller until the driver dies
      void waitForPorterToDie()
      Bloks the caller until the porter dies

      • Methods inherited from interface Driver.IDriverGenRep

      • Methods inherited from interface Servers.arrivalTerminalExit.IArrivalTerminalExitGenRep

        Registers the new service's location on the General Repository.
